news_header: Amazon.com Inc. is set to report Q4 2024 earnings on Feb. 6, 2025, with strong growth indicators and a positive earnings outlook.
news_original_title: Buy Amazon Ahead of Earnings Today on Strong EPS Estimate Revisions
news_text: Amazon.com Inc. is scheduled to announce its fourth-quarter 2024 earnings results on February 6, 2025. The company holds a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) and has an Earnings ESP of +4.78%. Research indicates that stocks with a Zacks Rank of #3 or better and a positive Earnings ESP have a 70% chance of beating earnings estimates. Amazon is benefiting from strong Prime momentum, a robust advertising business, and its leading position in cloud services through AWS. The Zacks Consensus Estimate for Q4 2024 predicts revenues of $187.28 billion and EPS of $1.52, reflecting significant year-over-year growth. Additionally, the long-term EPS growth rate for Amazon is projected at 28.2%, well above the S&P 500 average.
